staxel.village.character.dialogue.Vorlen: Would you not agree that we need more ^c:1486b0;paintings^c:pop; on our walls?
Do you not think it would be fantastic to have some ^c:1486b0;fossils^c:pop; in our home?
It would add quite some mystery to the house!
Do you think we could invest in more antique furniture?
Perhaps some old dressers or tables?
